title: Plant growth
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and ERPI Classroom Films
brief_description: The sweetpea is used as an example of the growth of plants and the film presents the complete life history from sprouting seed to the dispersal of the ripened seeds in the mature plant.
creator_credit_for_label: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and ERPI Classroom Films
